title: Print, "America", ca. 1750
medium: Hand-colored etching with watercolor on paper
inscribed: At bottom margin: "a Paris chez Charpentier rue St. Jacques au Coq.; L'AMERIQUE; avec Privilege du Roy."
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: America, a woman with feather headdress, bow, arrow and quiver is seated on a crocodile, at left. At right is an Indian with a bow, kneeling and pointing at an animal resembling a monkey on a knoll behind which a man with a long moustache crouches. In the foreground is a man's head, pierced by an arrow.

tombstone.epitaph: Print, "America", ca. 1750.Hand-colored etching with watercolor on paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1921-22-255.
